pages.title: Volcanic Manatite
pages.text: A Manatite attuned to Fire with Runes of Fire.$(br)A Ring forged with this Manatite will grant the wearer resistance to fire; can also heal the user on demand. When used in a staff the caster can make enemies in a radius burn, making them also weak in the process.
$(l)Ring Effects$()$(br)$(li)Passive: Fire Resistance$(li)Active: Instant Health IV

pages.title: Volcanic Staffs
pages.text: Duration, Power and Range of the effects depend on the tier of the staff.$(br)Wooden is the worst. Silver has good range, but weaker effects and moderate cooldown. Gold has abysmal range, but powerful effects with a long cooldown. Archmage is the best.
